EmailTemplate.description: Email to notify the field that a WRF request can't be processed
EmailTemplate.name: WRF Requests: Non-Formal RFPs and <$150K
EmailTemplate.subject: WRF Request Closed: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.WRF_Requestor_Name__c},
Thank you for your Work Request submission for {!Case.Account}.
Unfortunately, this particular request does not meet the requirement necessary to be tasked to a Pricing Analyst - Formal RFP / Customer request or an Opportunity Value > $150K.
You must use the self-service tool DealMaker to completed your request. This WRF will be closed.
Thank you
BSD BIDS
